segments.text: I see the girl reaching up, her hand open and ready for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s the smarter one, letting her brother do the risky part.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the jar that he doesn’t see how unstable he is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they do this often when the woman isn’t looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring over the sink, and it’s getting everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like yelling at them to stop before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t fall—he’s going to ruin everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is going to be a mess if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR
